summary: A documentary feature chronicling the history of two New York icons and the journey that brought them together for the last musical performance at Shea Stadium.
cast: Alec Baldwin|Dan Barry|Dan Barry|Tony Bennett|Garth Brooks|Roger Daltrey|Pete Flynn|Don Henley|Keith Hernandez|Billy Joel|Paul McCartney|Mike Piazza|Tom Seaver|Darryl Strawberry|Steven Tyler
title: The Last Play at Shea
